authors: Matt Morton, based on the original AW sheet by Ryan Sigg & Steve K. Expanded by Author X. Further expanded and greatly improved by Anistuffs.
instructions: * Label rolls includes the -2 for relevant marked conditions.* Popup box is for roll modifiers like +1 forward, -1 ongoing, etc.  Enter numbers as 1 or -1, but not +1 (the + symbol breaks it).* Rolls auto-cap at -3 or +4 total modifier regardless of input.* 'Sum of Labels' is a safety check against incorrectly-shifted labels or overlooking the +1 at creation.* Along with the original 10 playbooks, there are 5 playbooks from the Halcyon City Herald Collection supplement, 2 playbooks from the Secrets of A.E.G.I.S. supplement, and 3 playbooks from the Unbound supplement.* Link to a cheatsheet for Active/Passive moves https://i.imgur.com/CibAteD.png.If you run into any issues, have suggestions, or anything else, PM on roll20; https://app.roll20.net/users/1665985/anistuffs, or report it at https://github.com/Anistuffs/roll20-character-sheets.
